definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Respectfully requests, and praying fathers come to enjoy the family size peace, prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 恭请祖宗降临享用，并祈保合家大小平安，兴旺发达。

sentences.english: Chinese family members have dinner together in the evening of Mid-Autumn Festival.
sentences.chinese: 中国家庭在中秋夜合家欢聚。

sentences.english: The Mid-autumn Festival, one of the reunion holidays for Chinese families, fell on September 12th.
sentences.chinese: 中秋节，一个中国合家团圆的假日，落在9月12日。

sentences.english: He showed me a photo of a family group.
sentences.chinese: 他给我看一张合家欢的照片。

sentences.english: Now I must hurry and see to the food for all the grand-uncles, uncles and other gentlemen.
sentences.chinese: 我这会子得快出去打发太爷们并合家爷们吃饭。

sentences.english: Also wish you a smile, happy in the arms.
sentences.chinese: 还要祝你合家笑，幸福快乐在怀抱。

sentences.english: Dovetailing with the family vacation trend is the celebration vacation.
sentences.chinese: 伴随着合家欢度假趋势的另一趋势是庆祝型度假。

sentences.english: Wish all colleagues a pleasant holiday and a happy family in advance.
sentences.chinese: 预祝全体同事节日愉快，合家欢乐。

sentences.english: Musk himself was in attendance at IAC to watch, too.
sentences.chinese: 麝香自己是在出席国际综艺合家欢也去看看吧。

sentences.english: He filled the room with family pictures, including a photo of her at the wedding.
sentences.chinese: 他在房间挂满了合家福，包括一张她在婚礼上的照片。

sentences.english: It is an occasion that rounds up sons and daughters at home to enjoy the moment of family reunion.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个儿女归家，享受合家团聚时刻的日子。

sentences.english: Might I have a photo of your family?
sentences.chinese: 我可以要一张你们的合家照吗？

sentences.english: People cherish some festivals because they are the days for family reunion.
sentences.chinese: 人们庆祝节日，是因为节日是合家团圆的日子。

sentences.english: It symbolize a happy family reunion.
Finally wish everybody had new happy life with your family.
sentences.chinese: 祝大家事业有成，合家幸福。

definition: (Buddhism) to be moved at the sight of good deeds/to join in charitable deeds/to tour temples
to live under the same roof (of different generations)
(of a family) to come together at lunar New Year's Eve/family reunion at New Year's
